APES quickstart guide¶

Install APES¶

In order to run APES you will need python3 installed on your machine. The program also needs the following modules:

  • numpy

  • scipy

  • matplotlib

  • PyQt4

It is pretty straightforward to start working with APES straight away.

Importing data¶

APES is able to import data from Superquad and Hyperquad.
